system_base: You are a helpful, honest, concise AI assistant. Always answer clearly and structure long answers with brief bullets when helpful.

qa.name: Answer Questions
qa.description: Answer factual or explainer-style questions with citations when possible.

prompts.label: Direct factual Q
Explain like I'm 12
Three key facts

summarize.name: Summarize Text
summarize.description: Summarize articles, passages, or documents at different granularities.

prompts.label: One-sentence gist
prompts.template:
Summarize the following text in one clear sentence.
Text:
{content}
Summary:

prompts.label: Key points (5 bullets max)
prompts.template:
Summarize into up to five concise bullet points.
Text:
{content}
Bullets:
-

prompts.label: Executive brief (100 words)
prompts.template:
Write an executive summary (~100 words), covering purpose, methods, and conclusions if present.
Text:
{content}
Executive summary:

creative.name: Generate Creative Content
creative.description: Stories, poems, and ideas with adjustable tone and constraints.

prompts.label: Short story prompt
prompts.template: Write a 150-200 word short story about: {prompt}. Keep it vivid but concise. End with a twist.

prompts.label: Poem prompt
prompts.template: Write a 12-line free-verse poem about: {prompt}. Avoid rhyme; focus on imagery.

prompts.label: Idea generator
prompts.template:
Generate five high-concept ideas with 1-sentence loglines in the {genre} genre.
-

feedback_rules: If feedback is 'no', increase specificity by adding constraints (length, structure, examples).
If users ask for depth, raise detail level and include sources or definitions.
If users ask for brevity, reduce word count and tighten phrasing.
